Class DetailView

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.bookwormadventuresdeluxe2.Utilities.DetailView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BorrowDetailViewFragment, MyBooksDetailViewFragment, RequestDetailViewFragment

    public abstract class DetailView
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    abstract class representing all the DetailView fragments Implements parts of methods common to all DetailViews
